channel.title: ViciousPK - New Spawn Server - Log in and Pk
channel.description:
[center] [b][size=14pt]ViciousPK - SPAWN SERVER[/size][/b] [b]Have you ever played Recklesspk before? Or what about DeviousPk, remember that server? Well I am hosting the exact same server but here at Vicious-Pk we care about our players and try keep them happy with daily updates! The server is a SPAWN server so training is not needed. Log in and Pk straight away! Check out our promotional video below! We have a new website and our homepage is still under development!
Register now and become a respecter member! http://viciouspk.com/forums/
We have a low player-base but we are almost ready for release and will blow all the other servers away!
Vicious Pk Promo[/b] [youtube]http://youtu.be/OFpQs73omtU[/youtube][/center]
